arts.ttl: Wolves vs. Fulham: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head record and previous meetings between Fulham and Wolves.

arts.ttl: Wolves fans will have bad memories after official Premier League decision for Fulham fixture
arts.sum: One of last season’s most controversial refereeing moments will no doubt come to mind in Wolves’ game against Fulham after the latest appointments for the upcoming Premier League fixtures. West Ham’s winning goal should have been ruled out for a foul on Santiago Bueno, while the Wanderers had two penalties turned down by both the referee and VAR.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Wolves - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Premier League clash between Fulham and Wolverhampton Wanderers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Jimenez, Traore to face former club? Predicted Fulham lineup vs. Wolves
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Fulham could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Wolverhampton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Doherty, Gomes concerns: Predicted Wolves lineup vs. Fulham
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Wolverhampton Wanderers could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Fulham.

arts.ttl: History on Wolves' side as statistic provides optimism ahead of Fulham clash
arts.sum: Despite no wins from nine, there could be hope among those at Molineux, as Wolves have had quite a bit of joy against Fulham, more than most sides in the Premier League. There may be hope for Wolves picking up their first win of the season, as history is on their side when they play Fulham.
